product_overview: Neon Pulse Calculator is a sophisticated, responsive calculator web application featuring advanced percentage calculations, complex arithmetic with parentheses, and an intuitive modern Neon Pulse themed user interface. It supports keyboard shortcuts and keeps an automatic history of calculations for ease of use.
core_goals: Provide a reliable tool for performing percentage operations including extraction, addition, and subtraction.
Support complex mathematical calculations including use of parentheses to respect operation precedence.
Maintain a history log of previous calculations for user reference and convenience.
Enable fast and accessible input through comprehensive keyboard shortcut support.
Deliver a visually appealing and highly responsive UI compatible across devices, emphasizing the Neon Pulse design aesthetic.
key_features: Core calculator functionality handling both basic and advanced operations.
Percentage calculations module specialized for extracting, adding, and subtracting percentages.
Automatic operation history saving enabling users to track past calculations.
Full keyboard input support for digits, operators, enter (calculate), and escape (clear).
Responsive web design ensuring usability on desktops, tablets, and smartphones.
Animated UI elements providing dynamic visual feedback and an engaging user experience.
user_flow_summary: User accesses the calculator interface via a responsive web page optimized for multiple device types.
User inputs numbers and operations either by clicking on-screen buttons or using keyboard shortcuts.
User performs calculations including percentage related operations and nested arithmetic expressions with parentheses.
Results are displayed in real-time or upon pressing Enter, and each operation is saved to the history log automatically.
User can clear inputs using Escape key or clear button and continue new calculations seamlessly.
Visual animations enhance user interaction feedback throughout usage sessions.
validation_criteria: All percentage calculations return accurate results matching mathematical standards.
Complex arithmetic respecting parentheses executes correctly.
Keyboard input fully maps to corresponding calculator functions without lag or missed input.
History log correctly captures and stores every completed calculation in sequence.
UI layout maintains responsiveness and visual clarity across all major device screen sizes.
Animations trigger appropriately on user interactions without performance degradation or visual glitches.
